sentences.english: I used to be really into fast food, but that stuff's kind of gnarly .
sentences.chinese: 過去我喜歡喫速食，但那是種垃圾食物。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a nutrient healthcare fast food, a preparation method and an edible method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明是營養保健速食食品及製作方法和食用方法。

sentences.english: I'm going to a real fast-food restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我要去一家真正的速食店。

sentences.english: I'm sick of eating instant noodles everyday.
sentences.chinese: 每天喫速食麪讓我喫膩了。

sentences.english: A sweet quick bread baked in a cup-shaped pan.
sentences.chinese: 在杯形盤裏烘焙的速食甜麪包。

sentences.english: Foul language reminds me of fast food.
sentences.chinese: 下流的語言讓我想起速食食品。

sentences.english: And we want instant spiritual maturity.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們想要速食的精神成熟。

sentences.english: Many fast food products contain MSG.
sentences.chinese: 許多速食食品都含有味素。

sentences.english: It is now utilised in the packaging of everything from pharmaceuticals and soap, to ready meals.
sentences.chinese: 現在廣泛運用於藥物，肥皂，速食食品的包裝。

sentences.english: The slow food movement began in response to the ever-growing popularity of fast-food.
sentences.chinese: 慢食活動是爲了迴應持續不斷成長速食愛好者的數量。

sentences.english: Soba noodles, instant, reheated in hot water, served with soup.
sentences.chinese: 速食蕎麥麪，以熱水翻熱，連湯。

sentences.english: The next day more than sixty black students took every seat at the lunch counter.
sentences.chinese: 次日，超過60名黑人學生佔據了速食店的所有位子。

sentences.english: Now let me tell you how to have it.
sentences.chinese: 現在，我告訴你如何做速食麪。

sentences.english: I guess I should have gone to the fastfood restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 我想我那時應該去速食店纔對。

sentences.english: Where can I buy instant noodles?
Ready-meals in the fridge always come handy when making bentos ;
sentences.chinese: 冰櫃裏的速食食品總是很方便，尤其是放在便當裏。

definition: oden, Japanese dish made with boiled eggs, processed fish cakes, daikon radish, tofu etc in a kelp-based broth
hot spicy soup (often sold in street stalls)
